Correlation of two matrices for more efficient calculations

matrixCorrelation.Rd

Correlation of two matrices for more efficient calculations

Usage

matrixCorrelation(
  mat1,
  mat2,
  type = c("pearson", "spearman"),
  rank_data = FALSE,
  return_pvalue = TRUE
)

Arguments

mat1

first matrix of data to correlate

mat2

must have same dimensions as mat1

type

method of correlation

rank_data

logical

return_pvalue

default=TRUE

Value

A dataframe with five columns containing the pairs of data that were correlated, the correlation coefficient, p-value, and number of samples included in the correlation.

Examples

# example code
